verbs.description: [ARG0: The three Republicans] [V: running] [ARG1: for the Senate] are taking different approaches in their competition to be the most Trumpian .
The three Republicans running for the Senate [V: are] taking different approaches in their competition to be the most Trumpian .
[ARG0: The three Republicans running for the Senate] are [V: taking] [ARG1: different approaches] [ARGM-LOC: in their competition to be the most Trumpian] .
[ARG1: The three Republicans running for the Senate] are taking different approaches in their competition to [V: be] [ARG2: the most Trumpian] .
